solution_line_template: Steve needs {num_lengths_4ft} lengths of {length_4ft} feet of wood or {num_lengths_4ft} x {length_4ft} = <<{num_lengths_4ft}*{length_4ft}={total_4ft}>>{total_4ft} feet of wood.
He also needs {num_lengths_2ft} lengths of {length_2ft} feet of wood or {num_lengths_2ft} x {length_2ft} = <<{num_lengths_2ft}*{length_2ft}={total_2ft}>>{total_2ft} feet of wood.
Altogether, Steve needs {total_4ft} feet of wood + {total_2ft} feet of wood = <<{total_4ft}+{total_2ft}={total_feet}>>{total_feet} feet of wood.
